Title: Fearbreaker
Description:
The skardyn have taken over the operations here in the Rumbling Wastes. That's why Berrund thought he needed Fearbreaker.

We're going to finish that job before I take the hammer back to Magni.

What kind of a queen would I be if I wasn't willing tae put myself in danger for the good of others? Let's get in there and save as many as we can.
ObjectivesText: Slay skardyn and save earthen in the Rumbling Wastes with Moira Thaurissan.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Shadowvein Point with Moira Thaurissan.
RewardText:
We got there in a roundabout way, but we still made a difference in the lives of these earthen.

Berrund, hopefully, has learned a lesson in real heroism. But I suppose we'll see in time.

Now, let's get this over with.
